mean_cn: adj. 实践的，实际的，实用的
mean_en: good at making or repairing things
word_etyma: pr=pre提前+act行动，做+ical...的→pract实践+ical...的→ practical实践的；实用的
deformation_desc: practical joke是“恶作剧”的固定用法。
sentence: My daughter's very practical - she's helping to build our house.
sentence_trans: 我女儿很善于实践，她在帮助我们建造房子。
